Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper Theodore A. Dobbs Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper Theodore A. Dobbs Memorial Bridge" in the village of Westbury, town of North Hempstead, county of Nassau.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper Theodore A. Dobbs Memorial Bridge"
